fullText: Lin-Manuel Miranda has written a biographical musical about Alexander Hamilton that is simply extraordinary, a show that arrives at the Public Theater with the freshness of the revolution it depicts.
dtliExcerpt: Lin-Manuel Miranda has written a biographical musical about Alexander Hamilton that is simply extraordinary, a show that arrives at the Public Theater with the freshness of the revolution it depicts.
